Dimensional Merchant: *You can exchange a Minion Coupon, Superior Minion Coupon, and Rose Spirit Coupon* for a Minion Pet. You just need to select the pet that you want.

[npc_%objectId%_Chat 3|Exchange Superior Minion Coupon for a Superior Minion.]

[npc_%objectId%_Chat 4|Exchange an Rose Spirit Coupon for an Rose Spirit.]
